/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with buildings on both sides, their facades adorned with ornate details that hint at the rich architectural history of the city. The buildings are predominantly white and gray, with occasional splashes of red and green adding vibrancy to the otherwise monochrome palette. The sky above is overcast, casting a soft, diffused light over the scene. In the distance, power lines crisscross against the backdrop of the sky, a common sight in urban landscapes. Despite the absence of people or moving vehicles, the image conveys a sense of quiet activity, as if the city is holding its breath, waiting for the hustle and bustle to resume.
